edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code

Class PPCodeTraceSlide

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPSlide
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPCodeTraceSlide
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ChangeListener

    public class PPCodeTraceSlide
extends PPSlide
implements ChangeListener
    This class defines a slide that can display a step-by-step trace of a program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPCodeTraceSlide()
      Creates a new PPCodeTraceSlide object.

      • setStackFrameRegion

        public void setStackFrameRegion(double x,
                                double y,
                                double width,
                                double height)
        Sets the region on the slide used to display stack frames.
        Parameters:
        x - The left edge of the stack frame region
        y - The top edge of the stack frame region
        width - The width of the stack frame region
        height - The height of the stack frame region

      • setHeapStackRegion

        public void setHeapStackRegion(double x,
                               double y)
        Sets the region on the slide used to display a stack diagram. If this region is not initialized, no stack diagram is maintained. This version uses the default values for the display size.
        Parameters:
        x - The left edge of the heap-stack region
        y - The top edge of the heap-stack region

      • setHeapStackRegion

        public void setHeapStackRegion(double x,
                               double y,
                               double width,
                               double height)
        Sets the region on the slide used to display a stack diagram. If this region is not initialized, no stack diagram is maintained.
        Parameters:
        x - The left edge of the heap-stack region
        y - The top edge of the heap-stack region
        width - The width of the heap-stack region
        height - The height of the heap-stack region

      • setMaxStackDepth

        public void setMaxStackDepth(int depth)
        Sets the maximum depth of the call stack. This value is used to calculate the size of each staggered frame.
        Parameters:
        depth - The maximum depth of the call stack

      • setFrameDeltas

        public void setFrameDeltas(double dx,

        Parameters:

        dy - The displacement in the y direction

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for stack frames in this trace. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font
